projects.name: MMORPG Shop - Microservices-Based Game Item Shop System
details: Designed 5-service microservices system (Auth, Player, Item, Inventory, Payment) with DDD and Clean Architecture
Implemented Kafka event-driven architecture with exactly-once processing and compensating transactions
Built gRPC services with JWT authentication and RBAC for secure inter-service communication
Tech Stack: Go, MongoDB, Apache Kafka, gRPC, Docker

projects.name: NanoRust - Terminal-Based Text Editor Written in Rust
details: Built terminal text editor in Rust inspired by GNU nano with syntax highlighting and core editing features
Published to crates.io with cross-platform support for Linux, macOS, BSD, and Windows Terminal
Tech Stack: Rust

projects.name: Goscanner - Port scanner written in Go
details: Developed concurrent port scanning tool leveraging Go goroutines for efficient parallel processing across full port range
Implemented TCP/UDP protocol detection for network reconnaissance and vulnerability assessment
Tech Stack: Go, Cobra

projects.name: Thai Bad Words - NPM Library for Thai Content Moderation (Co-Contributor)
details: Refactored data structures and optimized search algorithms for improved content filtering performance
Implemented comprehensive unit testing suite using Jest to ensure code reliability and maintainability
Tech Stack: TypeScript, Jest

projects.name: ZigBrute - Password Cracking Tool
details: Built password cracking tool in Zig with optimized bruteforce algorithms for ethical hacking research
Implemented multiple cracking modes including dictionary, hybrid, and mask attacks for penetration testing workflows
Tech Stack: Zig

projects.name: MyIP - Terminal-Based Network Interface Monitor
details: Built cross-platform TUI application in Rust supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux for real-time IP monitoring
Published to crates.io package registry with 3,494+ downloads demonstrating community adoption
Tech Stack: Rust, Ratatui

projects.name: MNIST Neural Network - Machine Learning from Scratch in Rust
details: Implemented 3-layer neural network from scratch in Rust achieving 97.5% accuracy on handwritten digit recognition
Developed backpropagation algorithm with custom gradient descent optimization for efficient model training
Tech Stack: Rust

projects.name: Codingtype - Typing Speed Test Platform for Developers
details: Built typing speed test web application supporting multiple programming languages with real-time WPM calculation
Implemented responsive UI with modern web technologies deployed on Vercel CDN for global accessibility
Tech Stack: Svelte.js, TailwindCSS

contributions.name: Axios - HTTP Client Library
details: Contributed to documentation quality by fixing broken links and improving overall developer experience

contributions.name: Rust Analyzer - Official Rust IDE Compiler Front-end
details: Enhanced documentation accuracy by identifying and fixing broken reference links in official Rust toolchain

contributions.name: RustScan - Modern High-Speed Port Scanner
details: Contributed additional humorous quotes to CLI output for improved user engagement

contributions.name: Goyave - Go REST API Framework
details: Implemented custom ListenConfig support, enabling advanced server configuration options for framework users

contributions.name: DrawDB - Database Schema Design Tool
details: Improved documentation structure and readability to enhance onboarding experience for new contributors

contributions.name: Lynx - Cross-Platform UI Framework
details: Optimized repository configuration by updating .gitignore to exclude auto-generated build artifacts

contributions.name: TLDR Pages - Community-Driven Command Cheatsheets
details: Contributed new command documentation (crush) to help developers quickly reference terminal commands

contributions.name: Pruna - AI Model Optimization Framework
details: Migrated type checking system from mypy to ty, improving code quality and type safety across codebase

details: Developed full-stack web applications using React.js, Next.js, and Nest.js deployed across AWS, Firebase, and Vercel
Integrated RESTful APIs, OAuth authentication systems, and payment gateway solutions (Stripe) for client projects
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment workflows
